channel.title: Donator rights
channel.description: how do i make it where to only donators can go to certain place but not staff members my staff members get the same privilege as the donator and i would like to remove that

item.title: Donator rights
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

To add to what pokemonn said, you should only check if the play is a donator or not. Example:

if(!player.isDonator()) { player.sendMessage("You are not a donator and cannot access this zone."); return; } //teleport or whatever

The reason you should only check if the play is a donator, opposed to if they have staff, is that if a moderator is a donator, they should be allowed to access the area regardless.

And besides, staff should be able to access any part of the game in order to monitor everyone in every place.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator rights
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

it would essentially be something along the lines of :

if player.getdetails().getrights() != 1 || 2 || 3 {
player.getPacketDispatch().sendMessage(“You can’t be here right now!”);

} else {

if player.getdetails().ismember
player.getPacketDispatch().sendMessage(“Welcome to the Donor zone!”);

^^ this is not a real working thing tis just an example to get you to understand what you can do

Read full topic
